features.Accuracy: ±0.25% of Span (Master Gauges – only 200mm dial, all stainless steel internals), ±0.5% of Span (Test Gauges – 100mm & 150mm dial), ±1% of Span (Quality Gauges – 63mm, 100mm, 150mm & 200mm dial), ±2% of Span (Regular Gauges – 40mm & 50mm dial, non-weatherproof casing)
features.Dial: Aluminium, stove enameled white with black markings
features.Movement Material: Brass / AISI 304 SS with Deirin impregnated sector & pinion bushing
features.Socket (Shank): Extruded brass for phosphor bronze bourdon & AISI 316 SS for stainless steel bourdon
features.Case & Bezel: Cast aluminium stove enameled black – all dial sizes; Cast aluminium epoxy black – all dial sizes
features.Window: Clear glass; shatterproof glass available only in 100mm & 150mm dial sizes
features.Mounting & Entry: Direct bottom; Direct back; Surface bottom & Flush panel back
features.Connection Size: 1/4", 1/8", NPT, BSP – standard for below 100mm & above dial size 3/8"; 1/2", BSP, NPT, BSPT, API or M20 x 1.5 – standard for 100mm & above dial size
features.Standard Filaments: Blow Out Disc, Micro Adjustable Pointer

features.Bulb Fitting Type: Standard bulb fitting; custom-built design also available
features.Stem Diameter: 9mm up to 800mm length for 10mm & 12mm bulb diameter; 8mm for 8mm bulb
features.Case & Bezel: Cast aluminium stove enameled black; Cast aluminium epoxy black; Pressed stainless steel (100mm & 150mm dial size)
features.Window: Clear glass – Standard; Shatter proof glass – Enameled
features.Dial: Aluminium stove enameled white with black markings
features.Type of Capillary: Steel inner capillary covered with copper sheet
features.Mounting & Entry: Local (bottom or back entry); Surface (wall) with bottom entry; Flush panel with back entry

features.Product Description: Complete weatherproof thermocouple assembly manufactured as per IS 2848:1985, BS 1904:1964 and DIN 43760 standards
features.Construction: Made of specially selected, straightened, cleaned, polished and cut-to-length thermocouple wires

features.Bourdon Tube Material: Clear glass – Standard; Shatter proof glass – Optional
features.Shank Material: Brass; AISI 304 Stainless Steel with SS impregnated Delrin sector & pinion bushing
features.Case & Bezel: Brass for phosphor bronze bourdon tube; AISI 316 SS for AISI 316 bourdon; Cast aluminium weatherproof with screwed inner bezel
features.Enclosure Type: Stove enameled black – Standard; Epoxy black painted – Optional; Pressed AISI 304 SS – Optional
features.Length of Capillary: Standard – 2 meters; Available up to 15 meters
features.Type of Capillary & Protection: Inner copper capillary with copper sheet; Inner copper capillary with SS sheet; Solid drawn SS capillary
features.Standard Fitments: Blow out disc; Micro adjustable pointer
features.Vacuum & Compound Ranges: Vacuum 0 to 760 mm Hg; Compound (-)760 mm Hg to 0.6, 1, 1.5, 3, 5, 9, 15 & 24 kg/cm²
features.Accessories Available: Shatter proof glass, Electric contact, Booster relay, Max pointer, Glycerine filled case, Adjustable pulsation dampener, 2-way / 3-way isolation needle valve, 2-way / 3-way isolation cock, Anti-vibration spring dampening screw, Syphon
features.Sealed Unit Construction: Diaphragm welded with SS chamber; diaphragm loosely placed between top & bottom chamber
features.Top Chamber Material: AISI 316L; Cast iron stove enameled black (only for loose diaphragm construction)
features.Bottom Chamber & Connection Material: AISI 316 SS – Standard; Teflon coating – Optional
features.Connection: 1/2" BSP (M), 1/2" NPT (M), M20 x 1.5 (M) – Standard; Flange as per BS, ASA & DIN – Optional
